Reviews.Title: Gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Monique Williams
Reviews.Content: The product arrived on time, but the packaging sucked. I understand it was a used product, but it could've at least gone throughfactory reset prior to arrival. Needless to say, I had to do it all. I'm a strong advocate for the android system, but this Windows phone is not so bad. It gets what I need done. This product did not come with a charger , which I foolishly assumed was automatic. Yeah, NOT! Be 100% sure your product description says charger included. Fortunately, Amazon customer service swiftly handled that problem. I will say the phone arrived in pretty good condition.Not a bad purchase.Other notes:*battery life-it's a smartphone, so don't expect much*speaker-just as loud as, maybe even louder than, my sister's galaxy s3*camera-5 mp not so bad, flash great , image stabilization okay, video quality only good in youtube 720 hd mode*no security lock for apps/text messages, threaded messaging(great feature)*3G connectivityMore updates later***

Reviews.Title: Focus Phone
Reviews.Author: Kari Bartels
Reviews.Content: Perfect phone! Easy to use, great photos, high speed internet, I absolutely love it! Came quick with all the necessary attachments (power cord, manual, head set). Happy!

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Janelle Ward
Reviews.Content: I got this phone sooner than I was told. It's in great shape. I had no problem getting a sim card for it. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Don't send me something broken
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Kelly
Reviews.Content: I received this phone at the guaranteed ship date but it was not what I wanted at all, because who wants a broken phone. I went to the at&t; store because I was having complications with the phone reacting with my at&t; sim card, and they informed me that I was given a phone with a defective sim card reader. Maybe check your products before you send them next time, just a suggestion

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!!
Reviews.Author: Ltwitty
Reviews.Content: Everything I wanted in a phone and more. And in excellent condition. I would recommend this to anyone I over-joyed about this phone :) no complaints at all :)

Reviews.Title: Rating Changed
Reviews.Author: D. Smith "LC703"
Reviews.Content: I rated this product poorly but I took the phone to an At&t; device center and all it needed was a battery. Phone works great. The wrong battery was shipped but it worked out!

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: K wells
Reviews.Content: I really like the windows phone.  It's very user friendly.  My only complaint is that I live in a rural area and the signal is not received well.  I had to buy a booster for it to work at all.

Reviews.Title: Love my phone!
Reviews.Author: Angula Camper
Reviews.Content: I love my phone so much I bought my daughter one just like it. Everyone asks her about it and she loves it! Needs more Windows apps...
